summary: A chronological account of the influential late 1970s English rock band.
cast: Richard Boon|Anton Corbijn|Kevin Cummins|Bob Dickinson|Lesley Gilbert|Iain Gray|Alan Hempsall|Annik Honoré|Peter Hook|Richard H. Kirk|Terry Mason|Paul Morley|Stephen Morris|Liz Naylor|Genesis P-Orridge|Lindsay Reade|Peter Saville|Richard Searling|Pete Shelley|Bernard Sumner|Malcolm Whitehead|Tony Wilson|Jon Wozencroft|Ian Curtis|Rob Gretton|Martin Hannett|Joy Division|John Peel
title: Joy Division
